2.2 File encoding: UTF-8:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='FileTabCharacter'>
        <property name='eachLine' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='FileText'>
        <property name='fileExtensions' value='java, xml'/>
        <property name='charset' value='UTF-8'/>
    </module>"
}
2.3.1 Whitespace characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='FileTabCharacter'>
        <property name='eachLine' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RegexpSingleline'>
        <property name='format' value='\\t'/>
        <property name='message' value='Tab characters are not allowed'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RegexpSingleline'>
        <property name='format' value='[\\x09\\x0B\\x0C\\xA0\\u1680\\u180E\\u2000-\\u200A\\u202F\\u205F\\u3000]'/>
        <property name='message' value='Only ASCII horizontal space character (0x20) is allowed'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
2.3.3 Non-ASCII characters:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='AvoidEscapedUnicodeCharacters'>
        <property name='allowEscapesForNonPrintableCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesInComments' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesInLiterals' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
3 Source file structure:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='Header'>
        <property name='headerFile' value='path/to/header.txt'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RegexpHeader'>
        <property name='header' value='(package|import|class)\\s'/>
        <property name='multiLine' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='NewlineAtEndOfFile'>
        <property name='lineSeparator' value='lf'/>
    </module>
    <module name='EmptyLineSeparator'>
        <property name='allowMultipleEmptyLines' value='false'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='PACKAGE_DEF, IMPORT, CLASS_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
3.3.1 No wildcard imports:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='AvoidStarImport'>
        <property name='id' value='AvoidStarImport'/>
    </module>
    <module name='AvoidStaticImport'>
        <property name='id' value='AvoidStaticImport'/>
    </module>"
}
3.3.3 Ordering and spacing:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='CustomImportOrder'>
        <property name='id' value='CustomImportOrder'/>
        <property name='option' value='top'/>
        <property name='sortImportsInGroupAlphabetically' value='true'/>
        <property name='groups' value='STATIC###,###'/>
        <property name='separateLineBetweenGroups' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
4 Formatting:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='LeftCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LAMBDA, ARRAY_INIT'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RightCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='alone'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LAMBDA, ARRAY_INIT'/>
    </module>
    <module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='0'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='arrayInitIndent' value='4'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='8'/>
    </module>"
}
4.1.1 Use of optional braces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='NeedBraces'>
        <property name='option' value='always'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_WHILE'/>
    </module>"
}
4.1.2 Nonempty blocks: K & R style:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='LeftCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LAMBDA, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, ANNOTATION_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF, LITERAL_NEW, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_DEFAULT'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RightCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='ALONE'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LAMBDA, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, ANNOTATION_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF, LITERAL_NEW, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_DEFAULT'/>
    </module>"
}
4.1.3 Empty blocks: may be concise:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='EmptyBlock'>
        <property name='option' value='text'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE'/>
    </module>
    <module name='EmptyBlock'>
        <property name='option' value='allow'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE'/>
    </module>"
}
4.2 Block indentation: +2 spaces:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    <module name="Indentation">
        <property name="basicOffset" value="2"/>
        <property name="braceAdjustment" value="0"/>
        <property name="caseIndent" value="2"/>
        <property name="throwsIndent" value="2"/>
        <property name="lineWrappingIndentation" value="2"/>
    </module>
    <module name="CommentsIndentation">
        <property name="indentation" value="2"/>
    </module>
}
4.4 Column limit: 100:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='LineLength'>
        <property name='max' value='100'/>
        <property name='ignorePattern' value='^.*(http|https|ftp)://.*$'/>
    </module>
    <module name='LineLength'>
        <property name='max' value='100'/>
        <property name='ignorePattern' value='^package .*|^import .*|^.*//.*$'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5 Line-wrapping:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='LineLength'>
        <property name='max' value='100'/>
        <property name='ignorePattern' value='^package\\s|^import\\s|a href|href|http|https'/>
    </module>
    <module name='OperatorWrap'>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='EQUAL, NOT_EQUAL, PLUS, MINUS, DIV, STAR, MOD, SR, BSR, GE, GT, LE, LT, BXOR, BOR, LOR, LAND, TYPE_EXTENSION_AND, LITERAL_INSTANCEOF'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='COMMA, SEMI, LITERAL_THROWS, TYPE_EXTENSION_AND, TYPE_EXTENSION_OR'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.1 Where to break:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='OperatorWrap'>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='PLUS, MINUS, DIV, STAR, MOD, SR, BSR, SL, BXOR, BOR, BAND, LOR, LAND, TYPE_EXTENSION_AND, LITERAL_CATCH, BOR_ASSIGN, BXOR_ASSIGN, BAND_ASSIGN, DIV_ASSIGN, STAR_ASSIGN, MOD_ASSIGN, PLUS_ASSIGN, MINUS_ASSIGN, SL_ASSIGN, SR_ASSIGN, BSR_ASSIGN'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapNL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='DOT, METHOD_REF, TYPE_EXTENSION_AND, LITERAL_CATCH'/>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='id' value='SeparatorWrapEOL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, COLON, COMMA, LPAREN'/>
        <property name='option' value='EOL'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodParamPad'>
        <property name='allowLineBreaks' value='true'/>
        <property name='option' value='space'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CTOR_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
4.5.2 Indent continuation lines at least:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='4'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='4'/>
    </module>
    <module name='LineLength'>
        <property name='max' value='100'/>
    </module>"
}

{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":

        <property name='allowMultipleEmptyLines' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, FIELD_DEF'/>

}

4.8.1 Enum classes:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='EnumConstantName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[A-Z][A-Z0-9]*(_[A-Z0-9]+)*$'/>
    </module>
    <module name='SeparatorWrap'>
        <property name='option' value='eol'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='COMMA'/>
    </module>
    <module name='EmptyLineSeparator'>
        <property name='allowMultipleEmptyLines' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='ENUM_DEF, ENUM_CONSTANT_DEF'/>
    </module>
    <module name='ClassTypeParameterName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[A-Z]$'/>
    </module>
    <module name='MethodName'>
        <property name='format' value='^[a-z][a-zA-Z0-9]*$'/>
    </module>"
}

{

    <module name='FallThrough'>
        <property name='id' value='FallThrough'/>

    <module name='Indentation'>

        <property name='caseLabelIndent' value='0'/>

    <module name='LeftCurly'>
        <property name='id' value='LeftCurly'/>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>

    <module name='RightCurly'>
        <property name='id' value='RightCurly'/>
        <property name='option' value='NL'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_SWITCH'/>

}
4.8.6.1 Block comment style:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='CommentsIndentation'>
        <property name='id' value='CommentsIndentation'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='BLOCK_COMMENT_BEGIN, BLOCK_COMMENT_END, COMMENT_CONTENT'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RegexpSingleline'>
        <property name='format' value='^\\s*\\*'/>
        <property name='message' value='Each line of a block comment must start with * aligned with the previous line'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='false'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RegexpMultiline'>
        <property name='format' value='/\\*[^*]*\\*+(?:[^/*][^*]*\\*+)*/'/>
        <property name='message' value='Block comments should not be enclosed in boxes drawn with asterisks or other characters'/>
        <property name='ignoreComments' value='false'/>
    </module>"
}

}
5.1 Rules common to all identifiers:
{
    "Answer": "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='Regexp'>
        <property name='id' value='IdentifierPattern'/>
        <property name='format' value='^\w+$'/>
        <property name='message' value='Identifiers must use only ASCII letters, digits, and underscores.'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='VARIABLE_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF'/>
    </module>
    <module name='Regexp'>
        <property name='id' value='NoSpecialPrefixesSuffixes'/>
        <property name='format' value='^(?!.*(_|m|s_|k)).*$'/>
        <property name='message' value='Identifiers must not use special prefixes or suffixes like _ , m , s_ , or k.'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='VARIABLE_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CLASS_DEF, INTERFACE_DEF, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF'/>
    </module>"
}
